amendment.description: To provide additional funding for innovative programs at the state and local level.

vote.text: Amendment SA 70 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 70 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Frist. (consideration: CR S1405-1406; text: CR S1405) To provide additional funding for innovative programs at the state and local level.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 70 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
